casebody.data:
In re BROUGHTON. No. 240P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Celeste G. Broughton, Raleigh, for Broughton, Celeste G. Kenneth R. Murphy, III, for Wake County.

Opinion *195The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of July 2015 by Taxpayer for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
